title: Kiss Mark

adjectives: Marked by or tending to arouse sexual desire or interest
verbs: To feel an affection, emotion or love for.
Touch with the lips or press the lips (against someone's mouth or other body part) as an expression of love, greeting, etc.
To touch with the lips to express love or affection.
Of two or more people, to touch each other's lips together, usually to express love or affection or passion.
nouns: A kiss is the touch or pressing of one's lips against another person or an object.
Touch with the lips, usually to express love or affection, or as a greeting
A touch with the lips, usually to express love or affection, or as a greeting.
The act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof)
A touch with the lips as a sign of love or affection.
A form of affection
Touch with the lips.
Kissing is the act of two people touching lips.
Young female human
A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A young woman
A young girl.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A girl is a female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A young female; miss.
Either of the two fleshy protrusions around the opening of the mouth.
Fleshy protrusion framing the mouth.
Lips are a visible body part at the mouth of humans and many animals.
Visible body part at the mouth
Either of two fleshy folds of tissue that surround the mouth and play a role in speaking
A soft, protruding organ at the mouth of many animals, including humans
The two lips of a human being considered as a whole.
Love is a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes that ranges from interpersonal affection to pleasure.
An intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
Emotion based on affection
A strong positive emotion of regard and affection
In the Italian or Latin languages
The form of romantic affection that is considered pure and wholly positive, not just based on feelings of lust.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.
Lipstick is a cosmetic product containing pigments, oils, waxes, and emollients that apply color, texture, and protection to the lips.
Makeup for the lips.
Make-up for the lips.
Makeup that is used to color the lips

A cosmetic product
?, representing love, the organ, or a card suit
A feeling of love or strong attachment.
Affection is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.

The heart symbol or "heart shape" is an ideograph used to express the idea of the "heart" in its metaphorical or symbolic sense as the center of emotion, including affection and love, especially romantic love.
Philia, often translated "brotherly love", is one of the four ancient Greek words for love: philia, storge, agape and eros.
A conventional shape or symbol used to represent the heart, love, or emotion: ? or sometimes <3.
Affection, attraction, infatuation, or fondness is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.
As used by Aristotle in his Nichomachean Ethics
A stylized representation of the muscular organ, used as a symbol for affection, in the shape of two top lobes and a tapering bottom.
A positive feeling of liking
Feeling of love or strong attachment.

description: The mark left after a firm kiss is placed with bright lipstick. Used in place of ‘xxx’ (kisses), or to send a kiss to someone. More seductive than the kiss emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss mark emoji is a bold, vibrant red, shaped with a smooth, luscious curve that suggests a passionate imprint. Its glossy finish and subtle 3D shading give it a tangible, alluring quality, a signature touch of Apple's design. This emoji on Apple devices is a universally understood symbol of affection, romance, and playful intimacy in digital communication.
